website_summaries.verdict: A budget-priced option that delivers good toasting performance but lacks the signature high-quality feel of our other picks.
pros: 4-slice capacity with individual toasting functions and shade dials work well for families
Push-button Toast, Defrost, Reheat, and Bagel controls are easy to use
Extra-wide slots are suitable for thick or thin slices
cons: Browning dials feel a bit flimsy
The design isn't quite as compact as most expect

customer_reviews.title: Toasts unevenly front to back and anything over setting 3 is burnt on one side
customer_reviews.text: Toasts unevenly front to back - one side toasts much more than the other. I like my bread lightly toasted and anything over setting 1 is too done on one side, anything over setting 3 is burnt on 1 side. Pretty much worthless unless you want to manually monitor your toast.
customer_reviews.author: six

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks nice, toasts evenly
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is amazing. it's definitely more pricey than other toasters that I've purchased, but it was really worth it. The warm button really does only warm your toast. The other buttons should be used at discretion, but honestly, it's been a lifesaver for me. I have kids with sensory issues; we go through a LOT of toaster waffles. This toaster saves me a lot of time. It looks nice, it toasts very evenly, especially as compared to cheaper toasters I've owned. I have no regrets with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: A Toast to Cuisinart Toaster!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is the best that I have ever used. Cooks with finesse so that bagels, toast, greatly enhanced. Easy to use and high quality with small footprint. The crumb tray is located at the back of the toaster and I do prefer it to be at the front; but, turning the toaster around requires extra attention to cleaning properly. I am very impressed that the taste, crispness, and freshness is greatly enhanced for breads, bagels, etc.. I am vey pleased with this purchase. A great buy and quality for the price that is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: yarg

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toaster. After much research and agonizing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toaster. After much research and agonizing, and longing for good toast, I decided to give this one a try. Its great. The next day after installing my toaster, I went to the store and stocked up on toastable bread products. It works great, easy to use, even toasting, and it doesn't get hot to the touch on the outside, even on the stainless parts. I'm pleased with my purchase, and enjoying eating toast again.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not safe!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it with cuisinart. Had a toaster for 9 years that was great. Ordered the same (supposedly) to replace it and the display lights burned out instantly. Amazon replaced it with same model. Display lights burned out again. So I chose this one instead. Not had it a year and I’m throwing it out. The settings are awful. 2 is too light; 3 overcooks it. The last straw was getting a piece of bread dropped in bottom and no tray to get it out. Had to turn upside down to empty and now one side won’t stay down and sparks when I try it. Not safe. Switching to another brand. Sorry Cuisinart....third strike, you’re out.
customer_reviews.author: The Wendt's

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toaster. Not an expensive toaster or a cheap toaster. It toasts very well and is very consistent from day to day. We use our toaster every day so it is a very important small appliance for us. This is a good one. I wouldn't pay another $100 to $200 for one. Not even if it buttered the toast or put honey on it and popped the toast into my plate. Ignore the word "Compact" in the description. It is a regular size toaster.
customer_reviews.author: WVuser

customer_reviews.title: my experience is extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Lets be honest, as toasters go this is a fairly expensive toaster. It has a good rating which was my reason for purchasing but my experience is extremely disappointing. I used it maybe 4-5 times and each time the levers would not stay down. You must push the lever down to engage the heating element and begin toasting. Neither lever would stay down, they simply wouldn't lock in place. I tried repeatly and it would typically take 20 attempts before the toaster would begin working. Unfortunately I threw the box away or I would be returning it for full payment. Today I am buying another toaster. Hopefully I'll have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Clay

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse Toaster
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our 20 year old cheap toaster with this, and Wow! The old toaster could barely toast bread at the max setting. This thing can burn a bagel on 3. Once you dial it in, it is beautiful. We can perfectly toast a bagel on the 2 setting. We have one exactly like this at work in our break room so I know it stands up to extensive use.
customer_reviews.author: Scott and Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great if you like everything burned
customer_reviews.text: The look of this is great and the 4 piece design is absolutely awesome. However no matter what setting we use or level it is set at- it burns bread. Every single time! For what we paid for it, we are greatly disappointed. If the product’s functioning quality was as good as it looks- we would be happy but we are stuck now with a toaster that burns everything even at a 0-1.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Be careful if you want this toaster for bagels. This toaster toasted both sides using the bagel selection button. At the 2 setting it burned the back of my bagel. Our last Cuisinart CPT-440 toaster has worked great for 4 years but a bit pricey and being on a fixed budget I was trying to save some money. I will be ordering my old toaster again even though it costs more. Amazon (as usual) is excepting it back with a refund. That is the main reason I shop Amazon, their customer service is great.
customer_reviews.author: D Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Toast!
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, loved how it looked, and glad I bought this. Tested it within 10 minutes of opening the box. My toast, waffles, bagels and anything else my family puts in there has come out perfect every time. Much better than the last toaster I had. Easy to clean and use. Fit my needs and wants all in one toaster. I would definitely recommend to all. Not sure why others wrote a bad review, maybe they got a bad one, but mine has never failed me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!  Would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: So much better than my old toaster. I mean, you think a toaster is a toaster. Wrong! Had my old toaster for far too long and it was uneven and just a problematic toaster. This one is awesome and I feel spoiled having a toaster this nice. Haha!
customer_reviews.author: notimetodecorate!

customer_reviews.title: Pass, wish I could return it
customer_reviews.text: My experiences are only with bread. Inconsistent toasting. Uneven toasting. Long ways of the slot is inadequate for several brands we use of large/wide loaves of bread (Oat Nut, TJ's, Super Dave) so you only get toasted in the middle. Adjustment is finicky, 3 1/2, too light, 5 too dark, so 4 is perfect, right? Wrong. Have used it 3-4 times a week since purchase, so too used to send it back, but if I had the box I probably would. Can not recommend
customer_reviews.author: S@HD

customer_reviews.title: Worst toaster ever had!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrriiibbbleeee!!!! I have never had a toaster like this...every time, but every single time it burns the bread..even in the lowest setting in less than 1 min sometimes...and my fire alarm goes off.....i got sick and tired of this toaster....where is the quality toasters we had ????
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Buttons hard to Read; hot toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Nice toaster. Looks great and not too, too big. HOWEVER, I'm 53 (so maybe eyesight is not what it used to be). The buttons are small and hard to read. Also there is no Frozen button like I had on my last toaster. I've had this for a couple of weeks and I'm still trying to find the right setting for frozen bread. Seems very hot. A 4 setting could burn frozen bread.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Losch

customer_reviews.title: Smokes
customer_reviews.text: Crumb catcher is not as good as other toasters. Some bagels are too fat to fit in the top. The toaster smokes as it burns up previous crumbs. Have to get crumbs out after each use to prevent smoking.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Good 4-slice toaster. Wide slices work for bagels, unless they're uneven. It would be nice if there were an ON light (there's only a light if you don't push a button). It'd also be nice if you could push a button a 2nd time to deactivate it. The arrow, showing your cook setting, could also be made a bit more obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Lt Dan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible toast!
customer_reviews.text: When toasting, one side of a slice of bread will be very dark, while the other side is barely toasted. On the same side the top will be dark, the bottom light. I have to put the control on the lowest setting, and stand there popping and turning until done. Worst toaster I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Expensive model but heats very uneven, light on one side and burnt on the other
customer_reviews.text: Do not understand how they can charge so much for such a poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Value Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toast, even with frozen bread
customer_reviews.text: This toaster toasts bread evenly. On the 2.5 setting, it turns out slightly brown, just the way we like it. We tried the frozen setting for frozen bread and got the same result. We like this toaster a lot.
customer_reviews.author: No Whites Baking

customer_reviews.title: Quick, dark toast - hooray!
customer_reviews.text: We like a well toasted piece of bread in our house and this is perfect for us. Take so much less time to get that toasted and looks really nice. Very happy I went for this model. Our setting is on 3.5. Suggest 2.5-3 for what most want in toast. Great toaster!
customer_reviews.author: Londoner

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Exactly 2 Years  (so 25 bucks /year to use)
customer_reviews.text: I think a toaster should last longer than 2 years. We purchased this toaster in April 2016. Last month a knob broke off. Yesterday the right slot stopped working. I don't know why it's impossible to make a good toaster anymore but this one makes better than average toast when it's new but it doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: A Mom with Kids and Fur Kids

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like how fast this toaster is easy to use Settings a great .
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Gray

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: For the price I would have expected it to toast better. Bread comes out ok I guess but frozen waffles are no better done than when I used our previous cheapie sunbeam toaster. Burnt on one side, soggy on the other. Save your money and go with something cheaper because the result is the same.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quite a nice toaster but I purchased it because reviewers said it ...
customer_reviews.text: Quite a nice toaster but I purchased it because reviewers said it was cool to the touch. That is not the case. It is cool on the sides where the black is, but the top is hot enough to burn if you are not careful. It is a little smaller than other toasters - another reason we purchased this one, but I am quite disappointed with how hot the top gets.
customer_reviews.author: the girls

customer_reviews.title: Just got it and already made toast!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using a toaster oven and I absolutely hated it. Ordered this toaster and as soon as it came in I made some toast. It was Perfect! Both sides were even, it was quick, and it is smaller than the toaster oven. I love that it is stainless steel and not plastic - who wants a Plastic toaster?? Thanks Cuisinart!
customer_reviews.author: christie

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made.... Why in the he-l would any manufacturer put the Friggin plug cord coming out from the FRONT side???? What's that about?
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Uneven toasting but I still recommend and like it.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this toaster. Like most toasters it does not toast both sides evenly, however. Yet it's attractive, mainly cool to the touch, and the added bagel-reheat-defrost-cancel buttons are a nice additional feature. It's solidly made, as well. It's a nice brand name, yet for the higher price I was hoping for more even toasting. That is my one disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome toaster. easy to use once the instructions are read and understood.
customer_reviews.text: I was initially intimidated by the knobs and buttons. once I read the easy to understand instructions, all was well in the World. My Toaster and I had bonded.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Effective, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Toasted my bread really good really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really really good.
customer_reviews.author: Mochamoon

customer_reviews.title: Burns one side of toast and barely the other side
customer_reviews.text: Not worth buying this crap. Half of the bread gets very toasted and the other half not that much.
customer_reviews.author: Macberto

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm somewhat of a toast aficionado. I love this toaster. I purchased it at a retail storefront then found it on amazon for $50 cheaper, yes $50. Returned to the store and purchased from amazon. It does what it says and has worked like a charm since day 1.
customer_reviews.author: LINDSBLUED

customer_reviews.title: Good quality toaster. Attractive design, priced well.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with modern appeal. Toasted bread and bagels faster than previous toaster. With 1800 watt rating I now use #3 position on the heat dial compared to # 9. Good even heat all around whatever you are roasting. Great product. Priced well, would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Forbes H.

customer_reviews.title: Good Toaster for Bread  & English muffins - NOT BAGELS
customer_reviews.text: Toaster works great on Bread and English Muffins, Frozen Waffles, ,,, I don;t know where you buy your Bagels, but the ones here in NY - DO NOT fit in this Toaster . Other wise its a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: cuinart toaster
customer_reviews.text: After using this appliance for two months, I'm disappointed in the toasting of the bread. I have the dial on 5 and only the top half of slice gets toasted. I'm using english muffin bread. It should not be this way and appears to be a default in product.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney L

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 Years
customer_reviews.text: I purchased in July 2016. It’s a Great little toaster. Lasted a little over 3 years. One side of the toasting leavers broke and did not stay down, this the reason for four star rating. I Purchased new Cuisinart Model CPT-180 which has a 3 yr warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Yorkiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This is a great product! Love that it has a cancel button so I don’t have to force the leaver up to stop something if I think it’s been in too long. Loving being able to toast four things at once to!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Did expect better from this brand
customer_reviews.text: It works as a toaster should except it does not toast bread evenly due to the placement and smaller size of the toasting filaments. My old toaster had less "bare" lines, but it wasn't a Cuisinart and I can't get it any more. Did expect better from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster! This one allows you to really fine tune your degree of toasting. More accurate than any I've ever used. My daughter likes hers dark, my wife medium and I like mine barely toasted...each of us can have what we want with the turn of the dial.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart toaster for me is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My Cuisinart toaster works awesome! I've had it for several months now, tested it out. I am happy to report not one single issue. I would buy again in a heart beat. I love the bagel feature. Now I no longer worry about toast burning, mine comes out perfect every time on #2 setting.
customer_reviews.author: LilyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Where is the quality control?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older Cuisinart toaster I've had for some time. I bought this one based on the performance of the older toaster whicj worked just fine. This new one was defective right out of the box where one side of the toaster couldn't be depressed enought to engage the point where the coils light and the bread stays down. My impression of the Cuisinart CPT-340 was that it was cheaply made and not subject to the most basic quality controls.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Uneven toasting
customer_reviews.text: My husband makes the toast every morning and doesn’t care for it. We bought Cuisinart for the brand name but it doesn’t toast evenly. It will burn one end and barely toast the other. Wish we had our old toaster back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This toaster is great, it works fast and toasts well
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is great, it works fast and toasts well. However, if you don't like your toast dark, you will really want to put this on one of the lowest settings. It gets quite hot and quite dark quickly.
customer_reviews.author: LWaloski

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because of the brand. While it is nice looking (love the compact design) it toasts unevenly, edges burn before the center toasts. Hard to regulate the settings. Bagel setting has to be set every time. My cheap Walmart toaster (that I trashed before trying tis one) worked better! Have, and had in the past, other Cuisinart products. This one just doesn't measure up.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a broken toaster with this so anything would have seemed good, but I really like that the bread goes all the way in and gets toasted evenly. The knobs clearly display the setting and it is consistent with the timing, so both sides pop up at the same time. No more "what's my toast going to be like today" game!
customer_reviews.author: D. Cade

customer_reviews.title: Really like it, toast faster and more evenly than our older toaster
customer_reviews.text: I had to retime the eggs to toast. The eggs have to go on first bc the toast gets done faster now. It lasts evenly and quickly. The old toaster would also toast the second set darker but this one toasts evenly and the same every time. I like it looks, its quality and the way it toasts. Nice to have it faster. If your toasting bread for 5 or 6 sandwiches, you want them out together. This makes that a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea411

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toaster. It’s new I didn’t clean clean it yet just the surface. Every toaster is hard to clean inside. I don’t remember what I paid for it. I recommend this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Sara West

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought a $14, 4 slice toaster that works better than this. It wouldn’t toast on one half of one of the slots. For the price, I expected a lot more out of this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: It toasted things well. We bought ours Apr 24, 2015. My wife liked the crumb tray, defrost button, various buttons really. One side just stopped working. (We have 4 kids, so we think one of them touched it.lol)
customer_reviews.author: VGamble13

customer_reviews.title: It's a toaster
customer_reviews.text: It's a toaster, it toasts your bread and bagels. I wish it toasted longer because homemade bread tends to be moister and need more toast time. The reheat button is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M. Grabow

customer_reviews.title: I have always been happy with Cuisinart products
customer_reviews.text: I have always been happy with Cuisinart products. This toaster was a disappointment. One side of the bread toasts well and the other side doesn't. This is true of all four slots. My last toaster lasted for over thirty years. Sad that newer products are inferior.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Pascuzzo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Cooks evenly, looks stylish
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this toaster, it cooks evenly and it looks great. The only drawback is that the toast slots are just not long enough for all the long types of sliced bread loaves available to buy these days. I'm yet to find a 4 slice toaster with long slots yet, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Mc

customer_reviews.title: Bagel Setting Not
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, toasts well. But, bagel setting does not protect outside of bagel from being over-toasted. Same heat hits both sides.
customer_reviews.author: RWB

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our kitchen, and have received many compliments on it. Worked perfectly (without smell) from day 1. I use the defrost feature, and that seems to make a difference. Everything has been evenly toasted. Wide bagels from various bakeries FIT!!! :) Really love this... :)
customer_reviews.author: MTBWoman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, hard to find a good toaster these ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, hard to find a good toaster these days. Has to be turned up to 5 for normal toast, controls not very precise but, all things considered, a decent toaster.
customer_reviews.author: olecat

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful toaster and toasts well. The heat controls really vary so it is easy to find the perfect number for toasting to your liking. I just wish it had a crumb tray.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Was not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The product maybe lasted 2 months before the slots on one side wouldn't stay down. The product got really sticky anytime raisin bread was put in.
customer_reviews.author: Dayton Price

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far.
customer_reviews.text: Cuisinart toasters have been in out kitchen many years. My only concern are the timing knobs. They seem a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: King of Queens

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster and AMAZON PRIME is half the price of JC PENNYS
customer_reviews.text: looks good and is less expensive if you purchase at AMAZON, JC Pennys is nearly twice the price for the same item, plus if you have PRIME it will save you on returns if needed and the warranty center through prime can't be beat and any cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart products are great quality.
customer_reviews.text: The Cuisinart toaster is a great value. We have used it for bread and waffles. You are able to dial in the amount of browning that you desire. We like the fact that it can toast four slices at one time. The only issue ....it required a firm push on the down tabs/handles.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Careful on settings
customer_reviews.text: If doing a single slice one side toasts more than the other. But it works fine. We use low settings and it's ok
customer_reviews.author: MARIANNE

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but started malfunctioning at 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty with my other stainless appliances, but after 1 year and 9 months, it began to stop working. All four slots toast one side but the other side becomes soggy. This is an expensive toaster to last less than 2 years. (after less than a year, the left side started toasting unevenly, so we've been using only the right side--now this.
customer_reviews.author: LHearn

customer_reviews.title: It will toast 4 items at the same time consistently
customer_reviews.text: One side of the toast will be darker than the It does not toast each side of the bread evenly, and the toast level setting rarely gives the same result from use to use. It is easier to clean out bread crumbs from the bottom of the toaster than other toasters we have owned. I am disappointed in the toaster's performance based on the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: great toaster
customer_reviews.text: we had the prior model of this toaster and it lasted about 12 years or so. Bagel feature toasts both sides making it nice and crispy - did that on our old model, too. reheat feature is handy for when I'm interrupted - which happens often with four kids to get ready for school.
customer_reviews.author: Levis_mama

customer_reviews.title: Too Large for Kitchen Counter
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a three star rating because: The two double slots toasted unevenly, even at the dark setting it would not toast dark enough and the settings seemed to change over time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Farr

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster and worth the extra few dollars
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Only toaster I ever owned that toasts the bread evenly across the whole slice of bread.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Degginger

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love it. Purchased this for The Norwin Elks monthly breakfast buffet and it worked beautifully! Great price and product
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: It makes toast
customer_reviews.text: Very compact for a 4 slice toaster which I love. Easy to use. No crumb tray, so I have to shake the crumbs out upside down, not a big deal
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: this was one of the ones that got some of the best all around
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed SO many toasters, this was one of the ones that got some of the best all around. Have only had it a couple months...toasts unevenly something i had very much tried to avoid, and parts of the bread even on med high are barely toasted.
customer_reviews.author: loo

customer_reviews.title: Just Your Basic Toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Have had it just a few days. Spouse not impressed; has to toast the bread twice on highest setting to get the dark toast he prefers. It 's just okay imo. Levers seem fragile; doesn't toast evenly. . . we expect better from Cuisinart. Just couldn't justify spending $399 for a toaster! If you just want a basic toaster, this is for you. Would not purchase this one again. :(
customer_reviews.author: Tootsie

customer_reviews.title: Non standard BAGEL feature design
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the BAGEL feature as when activated it still toasts both sides of the bagel. I contacted Cuisinart and they said it's working as designed which baffles me as I believe the industry standard for the 'BAGEL' feature is that it only toasts the inside!! Am very disappointed with their lack of responsiveness and suggested that if that's their design that they should clearly indicate same in the product description!!
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Heats evenly and quickly
customer_reviews.text: This toaster takes up less counter space than my previous toaster. It heats evenly and quickly. Great quality in a small unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry J. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Another quality Cuisinart product
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with those toaster. The big thing for me is how fast it gets hot and therefore toasts. Yeah, I'm impatient and hate waiting for toast. Good sturdy construction and attractive design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: he says that he gets the restaurant like quality toast especially of his bagel whenever he does ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this toaster, he says that he gets the restaurant like quality toast especially of his bagel whenever he does it, and that's something he couldn't get with the other toaster that we had.
customer_reviews.author: Mazie R

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Terrible toaster. We have to turn it all the way to the top setting to get brown toast. We are returning it after the Amazon 30 Days. Cuisart is s nding a new one but we have to send the old one back with a $10 payment for shipping and handling. Grrrr
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: It burnt everything
customer_reviews.text: It burnt everything no matter how low it was set
customer_reviews.author: Willowkara

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is very fast - especially for plain toast or a bagel. Has enough settings that you can adjust to what you like. It also doesn't take up a lot of space, and the crumb tray is easy to empty and wipe out.
customer_reviews.author: WV Girl 85

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a 4 slot toaster with ability to have different settings such as bagel. This toaster fits bagels and larger breads well and is easy to clean. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are what made me purchase this. I am so glad! I love the "defrost" and "reheat" modes. I don't have to wait for things to thaw out, it cooks frozen bread to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: J. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Works Great... like a toaster should. Not rocket science.
customer_reviews.text: It toasts. I spent a bunch of time reading reviews. I suspect they're all the same and you're just going for style, but it toasts well! Like every toaster I've ever seen, it has heating elements that look the same as grandma's toaster... but easier to get the toast out, even when it's something small like English Muffins. Works great. Again, it toasts. Not complicated :)
customer_reviews.author: Dave Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Think twice, maybe 5 times
customer_reviews.text: Not much good to say about this toaster other than it gets hot! Inconsistant toasting. You have to fish each piece of normal bread out of the machine when it is done.
customer_reviews.author: Booboo

customer_reviews.title: Like they used to!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is tough and is built to last. It's like they used to make them! Great quality and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary White

customer_reviews.title: Burned everything
customer_reviews.text: Rather disappointed with what I thought was a quality name brand. Tried multiple settings and it burned everything.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Havira

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, toasts a little unevenly but acceptable. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Walters

customer_reviews.title: Browning knobs loose
customer_reviews.text: Toasts well. Like pop up feature to remove toast. Have one for home for 5 years and have had no issues. Bought this one for lake cottage but the browning knobs are loose and don't coincide with numbers each time you turn it. Don't like returning things so am living with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Rancourt

customer_reviews.title: Great Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Bought new one for home and moved its 3 yr old twin to our summer cottage in the Adirondaks ... Love it, compact and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well, worth it
customer_reviews.text: Simple machine that works. Love the room for 4 slices instead of just 2. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P.

customer_reviews.title: Good appliance
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toaster. Has all the features you need and very stylish. Size is also good. Cleaning the trays in back of appliance is very functional. Toasts evenly and use the bagel function frequently. All in all happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: shelley bishop

customer_reviews.title: Great Toasting. But, engineering and design not so much
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Perfectly accurate toasting at every setting every time. Wide slots for artisan breads or bagels. Cons: Rotary control knobs very flimsy. Cord storage leaves a lot to be desired, as it does with most Cuisinart appliances, of which we own many. You need to be a bosons' mate to wrap it up on the cord holders.
customer_reviews.author: Swordfish

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster.
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster. Nice even toasting on both sides. Plus it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Happy senior

customer_reviews.title: Bagel setting does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Thought this toaster would be perfect. I was wrong. The bagels were toasted on both sides, and the bottom/top sides (which should not have toasted at all on the bagel setting) almost burned. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Good-Great when new.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. That said, I think toasters are programmed to self destruct right around 24 months of use. If this lasts longer than 24 months I'll repost an update.
customer_reviews.author: JohnG

customer_reviews.title: Very Attractive toaster
customer_reviews.text: We really like the toaster. We just got it so we can't speak to its durability. But we certainly don't see anything that would cause us to suspect it won't be durable. Our previous 4-hole toaster lasted 25 years. So we know what makes toasters durable.
customer_reviews.author: Larry T

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking toaster. Does not toast evenly in my opinion. Knobs are a little cheap. Overall, I like. Wide slots for bagels and lift mechanism is good to get at toast easier. Better than my old $14 white toaster, for sure--would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bell4aday

customer_reviews.title: Looks and wirks great, considered a four star because
customer_reviews.text: Looks and wirks great, considered a four star because, compared to the two slot, thicker slices of bread seemed to get caught more often and are released with slightly more effort. The toasting results are to our satisfaction, am not really that picky and observant as some other reviews seem to suggest. I toast bread primarily when it is no longer as fresh .. so not really a toast expert.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Sahelijo

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking toaster. Takes a long time to toast the bread though. Has a frozen setting but it doesn’t seem to make any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Price !!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Toaster !! Exactly what I was looking for all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Very consistent temperatures; toasts the same every time. Reliable dial, I can turn it to another number and turn back and know how my toast will come out. Toasts rather quickly compared to others I have owned, which doesn't dry things out. Makes it toasted crispy and still soft in the middle. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Zebrog

customer_reviews.title: Nice toaster
customer_reviews.text: I like this double toaster. We use it several times a day. we like toast aith every meal almost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful toaster
customer_reviews.text: Got it quickly in two days.Nicely packaged .Easy to use and clean.Work very well. It take couples min to get 4 toasts of bread.Love it. Thanks you for great product
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Vitvitskiy

product_meta.title: Cuisinart CPT-340 Compact Stainless 4-Slice Toaster, Brushed Stainless
product_meta.description:
Style Name:4-Slice| Design:ToasterThe classic stainless steel toaster gets a modern update with this 4-slice toaster by Cuisinart. It saves space, placed sideways or facing forward, to fit any kitchen consumer. Whether making thick bagel halves or thin sliced breads, the wide slots, high-lift carriage and custom controls ensure even, precise and convenient toasting, every time.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Compact design with stainless steel construction

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,444 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
